  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oai</catalog>
            <entry>oai:merli.xtec.cat:merli/1012</entry>
          </identifier>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>MERLI</catalog>
            <entry>merli/1012</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="ca">Concavitat i convexitat</string>
            <string language="en">Concavity and convexity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Konkavität und Konvexität</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Concavité et convexité</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Concavity e convexity</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Concavità e convessità</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Concavity και convexity</string>
          </title>
          <language>ca</language>
          <description>
            <string language="ca">Miniunitat didàctica (MUD) interactiva que estudia els conceptes de concavitat i convexitat dels polígons mitjançant activitats que treballen els diferents tipus d'angles i les diagonals. Conté activitats d'exercitació i d'autoavaluació.</string>
            <string language="en">Interactive mini teaching unit (MUD) on the concavity and convexity of polygons, with activities on the different types of angles and the diagonals. It includes practice and self-assessment activities.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">geometria</string>
            <string language="en">geometry</string>
            <string language="es">geometría</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">mesura</string>
            <string language="en">measurement</string>
            <string language="es">medida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="ca">trigonometria</string>
            <string language="en">trigonometry</string>
            <string language="es">trigonometría</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Interaktive unterrichtende Minimaßeinheit 
(SCHLAMM) auf der Konkavität und der Konvexität der Polygone, mit 
Aktivitäten auf den unterschiedlichen Typen von Winkeln und von 
Diagonalen. Er schließt Praxis- und 
Selbstbewertungsaktivitäten ein.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Mini unité d'enseignement interactive (BOUE) sur 
la concavité et la convexité des polygones, avec des activités sur 
les différents types des angles et des diagonales. Elle inclut 
la pratique et les activités de art de l'auto-portrait-assessment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Unidade ensinando mini interativa (LAMA) no 
concavity e no convexity dos polygons, com atividades nos tipos 
diferentes de ângulos e das diagonais. Inclui atividades da 
prática e do self-assessment.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Mini unità d'istruzione interattiva (FANGO) su 
concavità e su convessità dei poligoni, con le attività sui tipi 
differenti di angoli e delle diagonali. Include le attività di 
valutazione di se stesso e di pratica.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Διαλογική μίνι μονάδα διδασκαλίας (ΛΑΣΠΗ) concavity
και convexity των πολυγώνων, με τις δραστηριότητες στους 
διαφορετικούς τύπους γωνιών και των διαγώνιών. 
Περιλαμβάνει τις δραστηριότητες πρακτικής και 
αυτοαξιολόγησης.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Geometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Messen</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Trigonometrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">la géométrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">mesure</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">trigonométrie</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">geometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">medida</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">trigonometry</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">la geometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">misura</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">trigonometria</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">γεωμετρία</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μέτρηση</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">trigonometry</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>
